item.title: How to Set Up a Local LLM with Ollama + Ngrok for Remote Access
item.description: This guide walks you through setting up a local LLM on a Mac mini using Ollama and enabling remote access with Ngrok. Itâ€™s a simple, secure way to use AI tools without sending your data to the cloud.
